trans-unit.source: Represents the look and feel of a row in a table layout.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料表配置中的資料列的外觀與風格。

trans-unit.source: The RowStyle class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: RowStyle 類別表示使用者介面 (UI) 的特性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>中的資料列

trans-unit.source: The styles for all the rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有資料列的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>中收集到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> for a row.
trans-unit.target: 這個簡單的類別提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class to its default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref>類別為其預設狀態。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>屬性設為 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref>類別使用提供<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>屬性設為 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>指出應如何在資料列應該調整大小相對於其包含的資料表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> and height values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref>類別使用提供<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref>和高度值。

trans-unit.source: The `height` parameter will take on different meanings depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `height`參數會採用不同的意義取決於`sizeType`參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> indicating how the row should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>指出應如何在資料列應該調整大小相對於其包含的資料表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred height in pixels or percentage of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>, depending on `sizeType`.
trans-unit.target: 以像素或百分比的慣用的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>，端視`sizeType`。

trans-unit.source: height is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: height小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The Height property will take on different meanings depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 高度屬性會採用不同的意義取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible meanings of Height.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明可能的意思的高度。

trans-unit.source: |`SizeType` value|`Height` interpretation| |----------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred row height in pixels (fractional portion ignored).| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|Not applicable—the Height property is ignored.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|The preferred row height as a percentage of the containing table.|
trans-unit.target: |`SizeType`值 |`Height`解譯 | |----------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|慣用資料列高度，單位為像素 （忽略小數部分）。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|不適用，則會忽略高度屬性。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>|慣用的資料列高度，以包含資料表的百分比表示。 |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of a row in pixels or percentage of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*> property.
trans-unit.target: 以像素或百分比的資料列的慣用的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>，端視<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType*>

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0 when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，值為小於 0。
